metadata.title: CVE-2014-9219 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the redirection feature inurl.php in phpMyAdmin 4.2.x before 4.2.13.1 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the url parameter.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
